intro: Jasione amethystina f. glabra, commonly known as the smooth amethyst fleabane, is a flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is a low-growing perennial with pale violet to lavender flowers that bloom in summer. The plant features smooth, glabrous stems and leaves, which distinguish it from other varieties of Jasione. Native to the Mediterranean region, it thrives in rocky or sandy soils. Its botanical characteristics make it a valuable addition to gardens and ecological landscapes.
